modName: The Oblivion Realm Mod By Shadow0987
summary:
This mod adds a portal to the oblivion
realm Check it out
descriptionHtml:
[color=Orange]Check Out My Newest Daedric Realm Mod!!!Â [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57905]Daedric Realm Gate (Adventure) (Player Home) - Nexus Mods[/url]

[Description] [/color]
[color=#ffff00] Hi I bring you Oblivion realm mod
this mod adds a place to travel to
called the oblivion realm there are
Daedric and the creature off oblivion
like the scump and the Clannfear but
the scump and Clannfear is not 100%
the same as off oblivion but they are good
enough.

Were do i go ? look in the pictures tab there is a map showing you were
A tip for you curious people Yes going into the lava will kill you just letting you guys know OK.

Also a player home at the middle
tower at the top Floor full of
everything you need like 100 chest
haha ye there are chest everywere so
no need to chuck every thing on the
floor. It has a crafting area A bed A throne and a cozy Daedric feel. [/color]

[color=Orange] [HOW TO PLAY THE MOD] [/color]
[color=#ffff00] Well there are 2 towers both have
keys you have to go to the tower on
the right and go into the tower there
should be a key at the top then do the
same to the tower on the left once got
that key you can go into the tower in
the middle go to the top there will be a
door go into it and there is your player
home when your in there turn around
there will be 2 doors the left 1 leads
you back from were you came and the
right 1 gets you back outside I did that
bacause it would take to long going up
the tower each time so enjoy this mod.
Also the trailer want to see what this
mod looks like check out this video.
Also you will need allot of potions also a strong sword. [/color]
[color=Pink]
LINK!!!!

[youtube]S3kvIhZILes[/youtube]

If your to lazy the video is in the tabs
up top. [/color]
